description:
Lost Chiko is 2D Adventure Game,

Our main character, Chiko, is lost in this universe. And it has to get somewhere.
Previous explorer Chickens are failing in this adventure,
and you'll see them as you travel through this adventure, and they're probably not very lively.
But Chiko is different from them. You need to help him in this adventure.
Try to finish the game by defeating the enemies and finding the right items on the large designed maps.
Join this adventure through Forests, Caves and Snowy mountains!

Features;
Collect Items (Door keys, Foods and More!) on Your Inventory and Use.
Treasury Chests on Maps
Throwing eggs. Yes, you can eliminate your enemies with eggs!
Large Maps,
Challenging Maps.
and More!
name: Lost Chiko
